snippet: The Cavaliers won't be at full strength for weeks — maybe longer. Still, coach Tryonn Lue won't tolerate any drop-off in the NBA champions....
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers won't be at full strength for weeks — maybe longer. Still, coach Tryonn Lue won't tolerate any drop-off in the NBA champions.

headline.main: Champion Cavs Adjusting With Smith Out for Extended Period
headline.print_headline: Champion Cavs Adjusting With Smith Out for Extended Period
